Assessing Translation Capacity

Accelerators,

Our experience thus far with the PSA Rapid-Response COVID-19 studies has revealed that the PSA can accomplish a truly exceptional amount of collective work and data collection quite quickly (more updates on getting the studies "across the finish line" coming soon!). But a need also emerged, recognized by Ilker Dalgar, Miguel Silan, and Max Primbs, to better assess and organize the networkâ€™s translation capability. Thus, the Translation and Cultural Diversity Committee (TCDC) would like to collect data on the translation capacity of the PSA for future projects: in which countries and for which languages do we have adequate potential translators? This knowledge will help us to determine our potential capacity, or lack-there-of, in many possible data collection languages, and thus make better plans for future projects.

Please answer this very short, 1-minute survey, to help us. Thank you!!
